name: Treasure Hunt (MynameisCollin)
description:
You have been washed ashore on a mysterious island. In front of you is a skeleton with a bottle. Find the hidden treasures of the island and avoid the creatures that stalk you.

DISCLAIMER: This is my first game I've created using Unity back in 2017. It is uploaded as self motivation to work on other projects. I am currently working on a new project for release in Oct 2021. Be warned, this game has no win condition and will not be updated as I no longer have the Unity files. Feel free to leave a comment and follow my page!
